mapper.select: SELECT tbpostcmt.id ,tbpostcmt.created_at as createdAt ,tbpostcmt.modified_at as modifiedAt ,tbpostcmt.tbpost_id as tbpostId ,tbpostcmt.tbuser_id as tbuserId ,tbpostcmt.content ,tbpostcmt.deleted ,IF(tbuser.deleted = 'Y', '(deleted)', tbuser.nick) as tbuserNick ,IF(tbuser.deleted = 'Y', '', tbuser.mpic) as tbuserMpic FROM tbpostcmt, tbuser WHERE tbpostcmt.tbuser_id = tbuser.id AND tbpostcmt.id = #{id}

SELECT count(tbpostcmt.id) as listsize FROM tbpostcmt WHERE tbpostcmt.id is not null AND tbpostcmt.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= tbpostcmt.created_at AND tbpostcmt.tbuser_id = #{tbuserId} AND tbpostcmt.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') AND tbpostcmt.deleted = #{deleted}
